organ_transplant|demographics|contrib_re: TEXT. Primary key uniquely identifying each organs donor in the transplant matching system. PK = Demographics(Contrib_Registry). Example: D812743.
organ_transplant|demographics|age_count: TEXT. Donor's age in years at time of organs recovery. Example: 57 years, mature donor.
organ_transplant|demographics|blood_clas: TEXT. Donor's ABO blood type classification for compatibility matching. Possible values: AB- rare negative type.
organ_transplant|demographics|nation_ref: TEXT. Donor's country of origin or nationality reference. Example: Seychelles.
organ_transplant|medical_history|contrib: TEXT. Primary key linking to donor demographics record. PK = Medical_History(Contrib_Med_Registry), FK to Demographics.
organ_transplant|medical_history|med_his: TEXT. Comprehensive medical history and conditions of the donor. **NULL means medical history documentation is incomplete or unavailable.**. Example: None,Cancer,Heart Disease.
organ_transplant|medical_history|smk_con: TEXT. Donor's smoking status and history. Possible values: Never smoked, optimal lung condition.
organ_transplant|medical_history|alc_con: TEXT. Donor's alcohol use status and history. **NULL means alcohol use history is not documented or unknown.**. Possible values: Heavy use, liver function requires evaluation.
organ_transplant|medical_history|drug_co: TEXT. Donor's drug use status and substance abuse history. **NULL means drug use history is not documented or assessed.**. Possible values: Current use, high risk assessment.
organ_transplant|hla_info|immu_don_regis: TEXT. Primary key linking to donor demographics for HLA typing data. PK = HLA_Info(Immu_Don_Registry), FK to Demographics.
organ_transplant|hla_info|hla_a_val: REAL. Donor's HLA-A antigen typing value for immunological compatibility. Example: 89,11.
organ_transplant|hla_info|hla_b_val: REAL. Donor's HLA-B antigen typing value for immunological compatibility. Example: 22,60.
organ_transplant|hla_info|hla_dr_val: REAL. Donor's HLA-DR antigen typing value for immunological compatibility. Example: 59,9.
organ_transplant|hla_info|hla_dq_val: REAL. Donor's HLA-DQ antigen typing value for immunological compatibility. Example: 8,1.
organ_transplant|function_and_recovery|r: TEXT. Primary key linking to donor demographics for organs function data. PK = Function_and_Recovery(Recov_Don_Registry), FK to Demographics.
organ_transplant|function_and_recovery|d: TEXT. Donor's serum creatinine level indicating kidney function. Example: 1.62 mg/dL.
REAL. Donor's glomerular filtration rate measuring kidney function. Example: 103.4 mL/min/1.73mÂ².
TEXT. Description of donor's cause of death. Possible values: Anoxia, oxygen deprivation may affect organ quality.
organ_transplant|function_and_recovery|o: TEXT. Date and time when organss were recovered from donor.** Possible values: 02-18-2025 HKT.
TEXT. Method used for organs preservation during transport. Possible values: Static cold storage, standard preservation method.
TEXT. Cold ischemia time in minutes from recovery to transplant. Example: 702 mins.
organ_transplant|recipients_demographics: TEXT. Primary key uniquely identifying each transplant recipient. PK = Recipients_Demographics(Recip_Registry). Example: R947153.
SMALLINT. Recipient's age in years at time of transplant evaluation. Example: 57.
TEXT. Recipient's gender classification code. Possible values: F, M.
TEXT. Recipient's ABO blood type for compatibility matching. Possible values: A+, A-, AB+, AB-, B+, B-, O+, O-.
SMALLINT. Recipient's height measurement in centimeters. Example: 171.
BIGINT. Recipient's weight measurement in kilograms. Example: 55.
REAL. Recipient's calculated body mass index value. Example: 18.8.
TEXT. Recipient's ethnic or racial background classification. Possible values: African, Asian, Caucasian, Hispanic, Other.
organ_transplant|clinical|clin_recip_reg: TEXT. Primary key linking to recipient demographics for clinical data. PK = Clinical(Clin_Recip_Registry), FK to Recipients_Demographics.
organ_transplant|clinical|diag_detail: TEXT. Primary diagnosis and medical condition requiring transplant. Possible values: Acute failure, immediate transplant required.
organ_transplant|clinical|wait_time: TEXT. Number of days recipient has been on transplant waiting list. Example: 104 days
organ_transplant|clinical|med_urgency: TEXT. Medical urgency status classification for transplant priority. **DATA NOISE: 'Status 2' partially replaced with '2', 'Status 3' partially replaced with '3', etc.** Possible values: 2, 3, Status 1A, Status 1B, Status 2, Status 3.
organ_transplant|clinical|prev_tx_count: TEXT. Number of previous transplants recipient has received. Possible values: 0 previous transplants, first-time recipient.
organ_transplant|clinical|dial_status: TEXT. Current dialysis status and treatment regimen. **NULL means dialysis status is not applicable or not documented.**. Possible values: Hemodialysis, standard renal replacement therapy.
organ_transplant|clinical|dial_duration: TEXT. Duration of dialysis treatment in months. Example: 45 months
organ_transplant|clinical|comorbid_detai: TEXT. Comorbid conditions and secondary medical issues. **NULL means comorbidity assessment is incomplete or not available.**. Example: Hypertension,Heart Disease,Diabetes.
organ_transplant|recipients_immunology|i: TEXT. Primary key linking to recipient demographics for immunological data. PK = Recipients_Immunology(Immu_Recip_Registry), FK to Recipients_Demographics.
organ_transplant|recipients_immunology|p: REAL. Panel reactive antibody score indicating sensitization level. Example: 6.
organ_transplant|recipients_immunology|d: TEXT. Donor-specific antibody presence status. Possible values: Negative, Positive.
organ_transplant|recipients_immunology|c: TEXT. Crossmatch test result for donor-recipient compatibility. Possible values: Negative, Pending, Positive.
TEXT. Recipient's cytomegalovirus infection status. Possible values: Negative, Positive.
organ_transplant|recipients_immunology|e: TEXT. Recipient's Epstein-Barr virus infection status. Possible values: Negative, Positive.
organ_transplant|recipients_immunology|f: TEXT. Recipient's functional status assessment. Possible values: Mild Impairment, Moderate Impairment, Normal, Severe Impairment.
organ_transplant|recipients_immunology|l: TEXT. Life support requirements and status. **NULL means life support status is not applicable or not documented.**. Possible values: ECMO, Mechanical Ventilation, VAD.
organ_transplant|transplant_matching|mat: TEXT. Primary key uniquely identifying each transplant matching record. PK = Transplant_Matching(Match_Rec_Registry). Example: TM113504.
organ_transplant|transplant_matching|cre: TIMESTAMP. Timestamp when matching record was created. Example: 2025-02-19 08:31:22.330375.
organ_transplant|transplant_matching|don: TEXT. Reference to donor demographics record. FK to Demographics.
organ_transplant|transplant_matching|rec: TEXT. Reference to recipient demographics record. FK to Recipients_Demographics.
organ_transplant|transplant_matching|org: TEXT. Specific organs type being matched for transplant. Possible values: Heart, Kidney, Liver, Lung, Pancreas.
organ_transplant|transplant_matching|mat: TEXT. Current status of the matching process. Possible values: Completed, Failed, In Progress, Matched, Pending.
organ_transplant|transplant_matching|sco: REAL. Overall matching score for donor-recipient compatibility. Example: 0.005.
organ_transplant|transplant_matching|lev: TEXT. Matching level classification. Possible values: Acceptable, High Risk, Marginal, Optimal.
organ_transplant|transplant_matching|alg: TEXT. Version of matching algorithm used. Example: v2.5.
organ_transplant|transplant_matching|run: TEXT. Matching run identifier for batch processing. Example: MR324767.
organ_transplant|transplant_matching|mat: TIMESTAMP. Timestamp when matching algorithm was executed. ** Possible values: 2025.02.19 08:31:22.
organ_transplant|transplant_matching|dur: BIGINT. Duration of matching process in seconds. Example: 128.
organ_transplant|transplant_matching|con: REAL. Confidence value for matching result. Example: 0.056.
organ_transplant|transplant_matching|dss: REAL. Decision support system score. Example: 0.68.
organ_transplant|compatibility_metrics|m: TEXT. Primary key linking to transplant matching record. PK = Compatibility_Metrics(Match_Comp_Registry), FK to Transplant_Matching.
organ_transplant|compatibility_metrics|h: BIGINT. Number of HLA antigen mismatches between donor and recipient. Possible values: 0
organ_transplant|compatibility_metrics|b: TEXT. Blood type compatibility assessment result. **NULL means blood compatibility assessment is pending or unavailable.** **DATA NOISE: Values have random case variations (lowercase, uppercase, mixed case).** Example: incompatible.
organ_transplant|compatibility_metrics|d: TEXT. Geographic distance between donor and recipient in kilometers. Example: 1815 miles
organ_transplant|compatibility_metrics|e: TEXT. Expected cold ischemia time in minutes. Example: 539 minutes ischemia.
TEXT. Expected transport time in minutes. Example: 45 minutes transport.
organ_transplant|compatibility_metrics|c: TEXT. Estimated cost for transplant procedure and logistics. Example: US$5210.53
organ_transplant|compatibility_metrics|d: TEXT. Reference to donor demographics record. FK to Demographics.
organ_transplant|compatibility_metrics|r: TEXT. Reference to recipient demographics record. FK to Recipients_Demographics.
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|risk_ev: TEXT. Primary key linking to transplant matching record. PK = Risk_Evaluation(Risk_Eval_Registry), FK to Transplant_Matching.
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|org_qua: REAL. organs quality assessment score. Example: 0.964.
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|egs_val: REAL. Expected graft survival score. Example: 0.114.
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|eps_val: REAL. Expected patient survival score. Example: 0.352.
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|surg_cm: REAL. Surgical complexity assessment score. Example: 0.747.
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|surg_ri: REAL. Surgical risk assessment score. **NULL means surgical risk assessment is incomplete or not performed.** **DATA NOISE: Random NULL values added to original data.** Example: 0.33.
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|res_ava: REAL. Resource availability score for transplant center. Example: 0.567.
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|cntr_ex: REAL. Transplant center experience score. Example: 0.215.
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|cntr_vo: REAL. Transplant center volume score. Example: 0.919.
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|cntr_ou: REAL. Transplant center outcomes score. Example: 0.077.
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|qol_val: REAL. Quality of life assessment score. **NULL means quality of life assessment is not completed or unavailable.** ** Example: 0.185.
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|cost_ef: REAL. Cost effectiveness assessment score. Example: 0.037.
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|alloc_p: REAL. Allocation priority score for organs distribution. Example: 0.917.
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|donor_r: TEXT. Reference to donor demographics record. FK to Demographics.
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|recip_r: TEXT. Reference to recipient demographics record. FK to Recipients_Demographics.
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|cost_qa: TEXT. Cost effectiveness per quality-adjusted life year. Example: 45000 USD/QALY
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|resourc: TEXT. Medical resource usage rate. Example: 11.339999437332153 units/day
organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|staff: TEXT. Medical staff time requirement. Example: 15.46999979019165 hrs/case
organ_transplant|allocation_details|allc: TEXT. Primary key linking to transplant matching record. PK = Allocation_Details(Allc_Match_Registry), FK to Transplant_Matching.
SMALLINT. Sequence number in allocation ranking. Example: 24.
TEXT. Geographic region for organs allocation. Possible values: Region_1, Region_10, Region_2, Region_3, Region_4, Region_5, Region_6, Region_7, Region_8, Region_9.
TEXT. Allocation policy version used. Example: v2.7.
organ_transplant|allocation_details|dono: TEXT. Reference to donor demographics record. FK to Demographics.
organ_transplant|allocation_details|reci: TEXT. Reference to recipient demographics record. FK to Recipients_Demographics.
organ_transplant|logistics|log_match_reg: TEXT. Primary key linking to transplant matching record. PK = Logistics(Log_Match_Registry), FK to Transplant_Matching.
organ_transplant|logistics|trans_method: TEXT. Transportation method for organs delivery. Possible values: Charter Air, Commercial Air, Ground, Helicopter.
organ_transplant|logistics|don_ref_reg: TEXT. Reference to donor demographics record. FK to Demographics.
organ_transplant|logistics|rec_ref_reg: TEXT. Reference to recipient demographics record. FK to Recipients_Demographics.
organ_transplant|administrative_and_revi: TEXT. Primary key linking to transplant matching record. PK = Administrative_and_Review(Adm_Rev_Registry), FK to Transplant_Matching.
TEXT. Expert review status value. **NULL means expert review is pending or not required.** **DATA NOISE: Values have random case variations (lowercase, uppercase, mixed case).** Example: RejECted.

TEXT. Expert review comments and notes. **NULL means expert review comments are not provided or review is incomplete.** **DATA NOISE: Values have random case variations (lowercase, uppercase, mixed case).** Example: accEptABlE mAtCH.

TEXT. Ethics committee approval status. **NULL means ethics committee approval is pending or not applicable.** **DATA NOISE: Values have random case variations (lowercase, uppercase, mixed case).** Example: approved.

TEXT. Regulatory compliance status assessment. **NULL means regulatory compliance review is pending or incomplete.** **DATA NOISE: Values have random case variations (lowercase, uppercase, mixed case).** Example: under review.

TEXT. Documentation status completeness assessment. **NULL means documentation status review is incomplete or pending.** **DATA NOISE: Values have random case variations (lowercase, uppercase, mixed case).** Example: InCoMpLeTe.

TEXT. Consent status from patient and family. **NULL means consent documentation is incomplete or pending.** **DATA NOISE: Values have random case variations (lowercase, uppercase, mixed case).** Example: OBTAINED.

TEXT. Financial clearance status for transplant procedure. **NULL means financial clearance is pending or under review.** **DATA NOISE: Values have random case variations (lowercase, uppercase, mixed case).** Example: rejected.

TEXT. Insurance approval status for transplant coverage. **NULL means insurance approval is pending or under review.** **DATA NOISE: Values have random case variations (lowercase, uppercase, mixed case).** Example: APPROVED.
TEXT. Transplant coordinator identifier reference. Example: C7827.
TEXT. Surgeon identifier reference. Example: S8696.
TEXT. Transplant center identification code. Example: TC594.
TEXT. Recovery center identification code. Example: RC386.
TEXT. Laboratory identifier reference. Example: L445.
TEXT. Administrative reference to donor record. FK to Demographics.
TEXT. Administrative reference to recipient record. FK to Recipients_Demographics.
organ_transplant|data_source_and_quality: TEXT. Primary key linking to transplant matching record. PK = Data_Source_and_Quality(Q_Match_Registry), FK to Transplant_Matching.

TEXT. Data source identification and origin. **NULL means data source information is not documented or unknown.** **DATA NOISE: Values have random case variations (lowercase, uppercase, mixed case).** Example: uNoS.
REAL. Data quality assessment score. Example: 0.966.
REAL. Data completeness assessment score. Example: 0.78.

TEXT. Data verification status assessment. **NULL means data verification is pending or not performed.** **DATA NOISE: Values have random case variations (lowercase, uppercase, mixed case).** Example: verified.
TIMESTAMP. Timestamp of last data update. **DATA NOISE: Date format converted to yyyy/mm/dd.** Possible values: 2025/02/19.
DATE. Next scheduled review date for data validation. **DATA NOISE: Date format converted to dd/mm/yyyy.** Example: 04/03/2025.
TEXT. Quality reference to donor demographics record. FK to Demographics.
TEXT. Quality reference to recipient demographics record. FK to Recipients_Demographics.

organ_transplant|medical_history|viralst.column_meaning: JSONB column. Consolidates all viral infection status data including CMV, EBV, HBV, HCV, and HIV test results for comprehensive infectious disease screening.

fields_meaning.Cmv_State: TEXT. Donor's cytomegalovirus infection status. Possible values: Negative, Positive.
fields_meaning.Ebv_State: TEXT. Donor's Epstein-Barr virus infection status. Possible values: Negative, Positive.
fields_meaning.Hbv_State: TEXT. Donor's hepatitis B virus infection status. Possible values: Negative, Positive.
fields_meaning.Hcv_State: TEXT. Donor's hepatitis C virus infection status. Possible values: Negative, Positive.
fields_meaning.Hiv_State: TEXT. Donor's human immunodeficiency virus infection status. Possible values: Negative, Positive.

organ_transplant|function_and_recovery|o.column_meaning: JSONB column. Groups organ function assessment data including liver, cardiac, and pulmonary function evaluations for multi-organ status review.

fields_meaning.Liv_Func: TEXT. Assessment of donor's liver function status. Possible values: Mild, Moderate, Normal, Severe.
fields_meaning.Card_Func: TEXT. Assessment of donor's cardiac function status. Possible values: Mild, Moderate, Normal, Severe.
fields_meaning.Pulm_Func: TEXT. Assessment of donor's pulmonary function status. Possible values: Mild, Moderate, Normal, Severe.

organ_transplant|recipients_immunology|h.column_meaning: JSONB column. Stores complete HLA typing profile including A, B, DR, and DQ values for immunological compatibility matching.

fields_meaning.Hla_A_Val: REAL. Recipient's HLA-A antigen typing value for compatibility matching. Example: 89,11.
fields_meaning.Hla_B_Val: REAL. Recipient's HLA-B antigen typing value for compatibility matching. Example: 22,60.
fields_meaning.Hla_Dr_Val: REAL. Recipient's HLA-DR antigen typing value for compatibility matching. Example: 59,9.
fields_meaning.Hla_Dq_Val: REAL. Recipient's HLA-DQ antigen typing value for compatibility matching. Example: 8,1.

organ_transplant|compatibility_metrics|c.column_meaning: JSONB column. Aggregates compatibility scoring metrics including HLA, size, and age compatibility assessments for donor-recipient matching.

fields_meaning.Hla_Score: REAL. HLA compatibility score based on antigen matching. Example: 0.522.
fields_meaning.Size_Score: REAL. Size compatibility score based on donor-recipient measurements. Example: 0.228.
fields_meaning.Age_Score: REAL. Age compatibility score for optimal matching. Example: 0.327.

organ_transplant|risk_evaluation|riskmet.column_meaning: JSONB column. Combines multiple risk assessment scores including immunological, infection, rejection, complication, readmission, and mortality risks.

fields_meaning.Immun_Risk: REAL. Immunological risk assessment score. Example: 0.607.
fields_meaning.Infect_Risk: REAL. Infection risk assessment score. Example: 0.48.
fields_meaning.Reject_Risk: REAL. Rejection risk assessment score. Example: 0.527.
fields_meaning.Cmpl_Risk: REAL. Complication risk assessment score. Example: 0.349.
fields_meaning.Readmit_Risk: REAL. Readmission risk assessment score. Example: 0.747.
fields_meaning.Mort_Risk: REAL. Mortality risk assessment score. Example: 0.674.

organ_transplant|demographics|physicalst.column_meaning: JSONB column. Groups physical measurements and characteristics including height, weight, BMI, and demographic information for donor assessment.

fields_meaning.Height_Cm: SMALLINT. Donor's height measurement in centimeters. Example: 171.
fields_meaning.Weight_Kg: SMALLINT. Donor's weight measurement in kilograms. Example: 55.
fields_meaning.Bmi_Value: REAL. Donor's calculated body mass index value. Example: 18.8.
fields_meaning.Gender_Type: TEXT. Donor's gender classification code. Possible values: F, M.
fields_meaning.Ethnicity: TEXT. Donor's ethnic or racial background classification. Possible values: African, Asian, Caucasian, Hispanic, Other.
